name: Until Zero
description:
After a devastating nuclear war, which erased the United States from the map in 1983, brought humanity to its knees. Global temperature quickly dropped below -17°C and still decreases over time. A total of 10 Spaceships built by the USSR, with the help of surviving countries, will be launched to space which only capable of carrying 30,000 passengers each. World leaders, rich people, and V.I.P.s will be prioritized to board the Spaceship.

     The year is now 1988. Pyotr, along with his fellow engineers who helped built the spaceships, still does not get a ticket. It’s 48 hours before launch and Pyotr must sneak his way into one of the Spaceships.

CONTROLS
A and D to move.
W and Space to jump.
E to interact with objects.

GAME DESIGNER & PROGRAMMER
Luthfialdihe

COMPOSER
Matthew Steed
bisonfury.itch.io
YouTube Channel
